alert.note: Alert for Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 5:57PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Montrose and southern Mesa Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 557 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of La Sal, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Paradox. This includes the following highways... Colorado 90 between mile markers 1 and 13. Colorado 141 between mile markers 78 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
